Posts.Content: firsttimer920 wrote: I had an abnomal mammo on 3/19/14 and had t return on 3/26..I was told to return in Sep. Just had repeat With magnification views. Came back BIRADS 4 pleomorphic calcifications. I am scheduled this Monday for a biopsy. I was told they have to biopsy 2 spots. I have read that 80% come back benign.
